title: The Four seasons of Japan
brief_description: Japanese countryside seen during the four seasons of the year. Eaqch season is marked by definite changes in the appearance of the landscape and foliage and each is celebrated by an appropriate festival.Shows changes in everyday life, sports and customs, and in nature, through each season.
